meanings.definition: The state or quality of being previous.
meanings.sent1: Her previousness in the class made her a reliable source of information.
meanings.sent2: The previousness of the event was evident in the old photographs.
meanings.sent3: His previousness in always arriving early to meetings became a running joke among his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The previousness of the ancient ruins transported visitors back in time.
meanings.sent5: The previousness of her experience gave her an advantage in the competition.

meanings.definition: The condition of occurring or existing before in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The previousness of the sunrise signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent2: We could feel the previousness of the storm in the heavy air.
meanings.sent3: The previousness of the dessert before dinner confused the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: The previousness of his actions set the stage for the conflict that followed.
meanings.sent5: The previousness of the first snowfall brought a sense of nostalgia to the town.
